00036 namespace {
00037   const char *usage_str = 
00038   "\n" \
00039   "usage: hypertable [OPTIONS]\n" \
00040   "\n" \
00041   "OPTIONS";
00042 }

00044 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00045   CommandShellPtr command_shell_ptr;
00046   CommandInterpreterPtr interp_ptr;
00047   string configFile = "";
00048   Client *hypertable;
00049 
00050   System::initialize(argv[0]);
00051   ReactorFactory::initialize((uint16_t)System::get_processor_count());
00052 
00053   try {
00054 
00055     po::options_description desc(usage_str);
00056     desc.add_options()
00057       ("help", "Display this help message")
00058       ;
00059 
00060     CommandShell::add_options(desc);
00061 
00062     po::variables_map vm;
00063     po::store(po::parse_command_line(argc, argv, desc), vm);
00064     po::notify(vm);
00065 
00066     if (vm.count("help")) {
00067       cout << desc << "\n";
00068       return 1;
00069     }
00070 
00071     if (vm.count("config"))
00072       configFile = vm["config"].as<string>();
00073     else
00074       configFile = System::installDir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg";
00075 
00076     hypertable = new Client(argv[0], configFile);
00077 
00078     interp_ptr = hypertable->create_hql_interpreter();
00079 
00080     command_shell_ptr = new CommandShell("hypertable", interp_ptr, vm);
00081 
00082     return command_shell_ptr->run();
00083 
00084   }
00085   catch(exception& e) {
00086     cerr << "error: " << e.what() << "\n";
00087   }
00088   catch(...) {
00089     cerr << "Exception of unknown type!\n";
00090   }
00091 
00092   return 1;
00093 }
